OOC: ..........INDEEEEEEED......

BIC: Arrow kept running along maniacally until he runs into Instrat.

Instrat: Arrow! What are you doing coming back towards the Cybertronian
Fire?

Arrow: Your Radicons took something of the Chivtrons. I'm going to take
something of theirs.

Instrat: Wha---wha---what do you plan to take?

Arrow: Something important. SomeONE important.

Instrat: A prisoner?

Arrow: I take no prisoners.

Instrat: Oohhh.

Arrow: I kill instead.

Instrat: What makes you think you can kill me?

Instrat gave a brief call of distress by entering a code into her commlink.
The Radicons heard it and started towards the coordinates provided.

Arrow: You hurt the wildlife. Now you die.

Arrow quickly sweeped Instrat up and locked on his deadly armbar-headlock
and keeping it on until there was a crack sound. There was no resisting.

Arrow: Your way of fighting has been passed down to someone else, now.

Arrow walked away from the beheaded Instrat as the Radicons headed quickly
towards the position. They weren't that far away, since they just left the
Chivtron base. Arrow already quickly got out of sight and ran back towards
the Chivtron base. Train Wreck pulled up, did his transform and drop of
passengers maneuver, and and kneeled down by Instrat.

Train Wreck: Why....Why did this happen?

Stranato: Victim of the crossface.

Train Wreck was crying, now.

Airbomber: That's it man, no more! First my brother, then Instrat, when will
this madman stop? He was killing on Cybertron and now he's still killing
now? He's a maniac, amigos, and he must be killed. We're going back to the
Chivtron base. This time we kill everyone there! EVERYONE!

Deemos: Did I hear you right? You're going to kill the Chivtrons?

Stranato: Yeah, we are. Arrow crossed the line and he's one of them now!

Train Wreck: He has commited such a violent and dirty crime against
humanity. He will bend under the violence and rage of us, now.

Train Wreck was still crying.

Deemos: In other words, that dead one there was your girlfriend.

Train Wreck starts sobbing loudly and Stranato tries comforting him.

Airbomber: Yeah! Those Chivtrons are DEAD! Care to join us for their
gutting?

Deemos: Certainly. I could use some fun about now. If I would have known I'd
meet you guys, I would have brought my son, Sharpedge.

Airbomber: Call him, we're going to tear that base up so bad and not one
soul there will survive! Not even one! So we need some extra men.

Deemos; Thank you, can we wait for him?

Airbomber: Yeah, pal, we'll wait for your son.

Deemos calls Sharpedge on his commlink.

Deemos: Hey, Sharpedge. I'm about to fight. I've joined up with these 3
rogue Maximals, and we're going to attack the Chivtrons. Want to join us?
It'll be fun...
